snippet: The NBA has long been considered the most progressive of North America's four major professional sports leagues when it comes to gender equity but more work can be done, according to some owners and former players....
lead_paragraph: The NBA has long been considered the most progressive of North America's four major professional sports leagues when it comes to gender equity but more work can be done, according to some owners and former players.

headline.main: League Proud to Be Progressive, but More Can Be Done
headline.print_headline: League Proud to Be Progressive, but More Can Be Done
